alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:59PM MDT until April 06 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Strong winds will likely lead to rapid fire growth of any new fires. Blowing dust will reduce visibility to less than a quarter mile in places.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Avoid outdoor burning or any activity that may cause sparks. The strong winds will likely fuel rapid fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
